message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $105. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?

I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer you the product for $102. It's getting close to the original price, but I think it's a fair offer considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit far from my target price. Can we meet at $92?

I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer you the product for $98. It's getting close to your target price, and I think it's a fair offer considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm really close to my target price. Can we meet at $90?

I understand you're really close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer you the product for $96. It's a bit higher than your target price, but I think it's a fair offer considering the value of the product.
I really appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I've got to be honest, I'm not willing to pay more than $85. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
